ff495f01-ae9a-4f8b-80ac-35743a3a683d:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"ff495f01-ae9a-4f8b-80ac-35743a3a683d","title":{"en":"Tuberculose"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"吸血魔團"},{"en":"Tuberculosis"},{"en":"The Bloodsuckers"},{"ja-ro":"Kyuketsumadan"}],"relatedIdds":["62d34aff-ca8d-4dc7-8419-4b3702104461"],"description":{"en":"(from [TezukaOsamu.net](https://tezukaosamu.net/en/manga/105.html) )\n\n\"Tuberculosis\" depicts the adventures of Kenichi and his uncle, Mr. Mustachio, inside a boy's body. After being injected with a drug called ZX that was discovered by Mustachio, Kenichi and his uncle have shrunk and become very small. \n\nWhen they enter the body of a boy and reach his lung, they find that tubercle bacilli (bacteria) are opening a big hole in the boy's lung. Tubercle bacilli send Mode (a tubercle bacillus), a daughter of Dr. Iyoa (also a tubercle bacillus), to Kenichi and Mustachio to learn the human language. \n\nThe two make friends with Mode, but a war breaks out between the tubercle bacilli and the commandos in the boy's brain, and the two become involved in the war.\n\nPublished as a tankoban, Tuberculose is an early work of Tezuka's that has not been collected in any edition of the complete works, nor reprinted along with others in the Fukkan [*Early Masterpiece Selection*](https://www.fukkan.com/fk/CartSearchDetail?i_no=68319967) boxsets. \n\nA second attempt at the work was done by Tezuka in the form of [*Monsters on the 38th Parallel*](https://mangadex.org/title/62d34aff-ca8d-4dc7-8419-4b3702104461/monsters-on-the-38th-parallel)."},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"07251805-a27e-4d59-b488-f0bfbec15168","name":{"en":"Thriller"}},{"id":"256c8bd9-4904-4360-bf4f-508a76d67183","name":{"en":"Sci-Fi"}},{"id":"36fd93ea-e8b8-445e-b836-358f02b3d33d","name":{"en":"Monsters"}},{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"3b60b75c-a2d7-4860-ab56-05f391bb889c","name":{"en":"Psychological"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"5fff9cde-849c-4d78-aab0-0d52b2ee1d25","name":{"en":"Survival"}},{"id":"87cc87cd-a395-47af-b27a-93258283bbc6","name":{"en":"Adventure"}},{"id":"ac72833b-c4e9-4878-b9db-6c8a4a99444a","name":{"en":"Military"}},{"id":"b29d6a3d-1569-4e7a-8caf-7557bc92cd5d","name":{"en":"Gore"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"c8cbe35b-1b2b-4a3f-9c37-db84c4514856","name":{"en":"Medical"}},{"id":"e5301a23-ebd9-49dd-a0cb-2add944c7fe9","name":{"en":"Slice of Life"}},{"id":"f8f62932-27da-4fe4-8ee1-6779a8c5edba","name":{"en":"Tragedy"}}]}

She works as cleaning staff because it doesn't require her to talk to people. One day, Asahi asks her to dinner and he confesses his feelings to her. He's an employee at a security company. He's tall and big, doesn't show much emotion; he's a little scary... She starts to feel a little comfortable around him when she sees he's patient with her when it takes her time to talk. c0c46de8-d6b3-4bfb-9783-e29028b05f55:::||@!@||:::2023-11-16T00:51:16:::||@!@||:::{"id":"c0c46de8-d6b3-4bfb-9783-e29028b05f55","title":{"en":"Monster Prince"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"怪獣王子〔園田光慶版〕"}],"relatedIds":["7471bb32-2e01-4382-997c-9604da2f63d7"],"description":{"en":"A compliment from Mr. Toshinori Otsuki, Managing Director of King Records Co., Ltd., who has produced numerous anime works such as \"Evangelion\"\nThe first and last monster encyclopedia that my father bought me was \"Monster Prince.'' I would buy a 20 yen boomerang at a candy store that would never come back and send it flying over the countryside.\nWhen I was in the second grade of elementary school, I read Sonoda Sensei's \"Akatsuki Sentai'' in the \"Shonen Sunday Summer Special Issue'' and cried at the end. 40 years have passed since then. I'm glad to be alive to see the time when I can read the manga of \"Monster Prince\"!!\n-- Toshinori Otsuki\n\n[Synopsis]\nThe passenger ship carrying Dr. Ibuki's family is sailing in the Pacific Ocean when it sinks due to the eruption of a volcanic island that suddenly appears! Ibuki tries to escape from the ship with his wife and twin sons Takeru and Mitsuru, but Takeru is the only one. was being swallowed up by the rough waves. Ten years later, a huge meteorite crashes near a volcanic island that is still erupting. In order to investigate, Ibuki revisits a place where he has horrible memories, but it has turned into a demonic island inhabited by dinosaurs that were supposed to be extinct and ferocious monsters. The ferocity of the approaching monster. The one who saved the investigation team from a desperate crisis was a mysterious boy who appeared riding a plesiosaur with a roar!\n\n[Commentary] \"\nMonster Prince\" depicts the story of Takeru, a wild child raised by dinosaurs, who, together with his partner brontosaurus \"Nessie\", confronts the planetary birdman and his monsters who are plotting to invade the Earth. This special effects drama was planned by Tokyu Agency, which produced the film, with the premise of exporting it overseas, and was shot with the human resources of P Production, led by Souji Ushio.\n\nThe production cost was unprecedented at the time, and it was aired on the Fuji TV network from October 1960, one year after filming began, to March of the following year. A profound story. Takeru's battle cry is reminiscent of Tarzan. Although Takeru's weapon, the boomerang, became popular among young boys, it did not air for long, but it was a memorable work for viewers.\n\nThis book is the first book compiled from the manga version that was serialized in Shonen King from January 1964, prior to its TV broadcast. The artist was Mitsuyoshi Sonoda, who had a great influence on the world of gekiga with his bold and brilliant action expressions. The powerful monster battles are sure to captivate even those who only know the TV version."},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"36fd93ea-e8b8-445e-b836-358f02b3d33d","name":{"en":"Monsters"}},{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"3de8c75d-8ee3-48ff-98ee-e20a65c86451","name":{"en":"Animals"}},{"id":"87cc87cd-a395-47af-b27a-93258283bbc6","name":{"en":"Adventure"}},{"id":"f4122d1c-3b44-44d0-9936-ff7502c39ad3","name":{"en":"Adaptation"}}]}

Papai, que na história original nunca se importou com a filha ilegítima, está agindo de forma estranha. \"Bliss, eu posso fazer qualquer coisa por você.\" E agora, a irmã vilã que vai arruinar a família no futuro chama minha atenção. \"Olá, querida, sou sua irmã...\" Tudo bem! Some research revealed that the boss’s type was someone who was 1) good-natured and 2) good at studying. Those who scored less than 700 points weren’t even worth mentioning. Witch Sensei\". ``Guruguru Medaman'',\nthe legendary special effects comedy that is enthusiastically supported by some enthusiasts, including ``Magical Chappie'' from the Toei Animation Majoko series, and the last TV anime series produced by Studio Zero. The famous \"Star Child Chobin\". A new edition of ``Hideo Azuma's Comicalization Masterpiece Selection My Collaboration Works'', which compiles the comicalized works of these popular programs, will be published in\na new edition!There are still attempts to turn TV programs into comics, but in the 1970s,\n\nAt a time when ordinary households still had little means of recording and storing TV programs, such publications were far more important than they are today. The four works included in this selection of masterpieces are all based on original works. It is said that there are still many Azuma fans who have never read Hideo Azuma's manga because it cannot be said to be 100% original.\n\nAt the beginning of the volume, there will be a color gravure consisting of illustrations including valuable \"Guru Guru Medaman\" design drawings, and at the end there will also be a special conversation with Makoto Aoyagi (Chairman of Shotaro Ishinomori Fan Club). Suki!! Majo Sensei\" published by Tokuma Shoten in 1981 Based on ``Hideo Azuma TV Anime Masterpiece Selection 1'' and \"Magician Chappie:\nHideo Azuma TV Anime Masterpiece Selection 2'' (all 2 volumes), it will be published\nas a new edition with illustrations and interviews that were not included in the book."},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"a1f53773-c69a-4ce5-8cab-fffcd90b1565","name":{"en":"Magic"}},{"id":"f4122d1c-3b44-44d0-9936-ff7502c39ad3","name":{"en":"Adaptation"}}]}

The young man was taciturn and never laughed, but he was a hard worker and quickly learned his trade, making the couple happy. In fact, he was a fallen angel, and if he found the answers to the \"three propositions\" given to him by God, he could return to heaven. It was a difficult question asking what is love? What is death? Six years pass, and one day a woman with twin girls appears at Semyon's shop...\nIn 2020, we live in a world that has completely changed due to the coronavirus pandemic. What do we rely on to support our lives now, and for whom do we live our lives?A 140-year-old masterpiece by a world-renowned literary giant has been revived as a manga, offering hints to the answer."},"links":{"amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/-/en/レフ・トルストイ-ebook/dp/B08GF9JB6N/ref=tmm_kin_swatch_0?_encoding=UTF8\u0026qid=\u0026sr=","bw":"de2e50523e-9ca0-49ec-b25f-8049fdf35c70","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/602167/"},"originalLanguage":"ja","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}}]}
